text: Bunny Roser (November 15, 1901 â€“ May 6, 1979) was a former baseball player for the Boston Braves. He was a left fielder. He was born in St. Louis, Missouri. He died in Rocky Hill, Connecticut at the age of 77. == Other websites == *Baseball-Reference Category:1901 births Category:1979 deaths Category:American baseball players Category:Sportspeople from St. Louis, Missouri
